definition: to wait in hiding to attack
details:
verb
- to wait in hiding to attack
= example: to wait in hiding to attack
= synonyms: ambush
- to cut one's way through the woods or bush
= example: to cut one's way through the woods or bush
- to live in the bush as a fugitive or as a guerilla
= example: to live in the bush as a fugitive or as a guerilla
